file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 21-25-02-04 - RAM AIR CHECK VALVE - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL RAM AIR CHECK VALVE - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedure to remove, install, deactivate, and reactivate the Ram-Air Check Valves. B. The ram air check valves are installed in the ram air ducts which send the ram air flow to the pack. C. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY ALL 21-25-02-000-801-A RAM-AIR CHECK VALVE - REMOVAL ALL 21-25-02-400-801-A RAM-AIR CHECK VALVE - INSTALLATION RAM-AIR CHECK VALVE - DEACTIVA- ALL 21-25-02-040-801-A TION PROCEDURES RAM-AIR CHECK VALVE - REACTIVA- ALL 21-25-02-440-801-A TION PROCEDURES EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 21-25-02 Page 1 of 7 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 21-25-02-000-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. RAM-AIR CHECK VALVE - REMOVAL A. General (1) This task gives the procedures to remove the ram-air check valve. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM MPP 06-41-01/100 - C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 191 191EL Wing-to-fuselage fairing 191 191FR Wing-to-fuselage fairing D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Inside the wing-to-fuselage fairing I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) Remove the access panel (AMM MPP 06-41-01/100), as applicable: – 191EL (LH ram-air check valve). – 191FR (RH ram-air check valve). J. Removal (Figure 401) SUBTASK 020-002-A (1) Remove the clamps (1). (2) Remove the ram-air check valve (2). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 21-25-02 Page 2 of 7 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: ALL Ram-Air Check Valve - Removal/Installation Figure 401 A ZONE 191 B DET. A (LEFT SIDE) 1 1. CLAMP 1 1. CLAMP 2. RAM AIR CHECK VALVE DET. B 1 TORQUE: 2.9 Nm ( 25 lb.in ) 145AMM210017.MCE E EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 21-25-02 Page 3 of 7 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 21-25-02-400-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 3. RAM-AIR CHECK VALVE - INSTALLATION A. General (1) This task gives the procedures to install the ram-air check valve. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM MPP 06-41-01/100 - C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 191 191EL Wing-to-fuselage fairing 191 191FR Wing-to-fuselage fairing D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Inside the wing-to-fuselage fairing I. Installation (Figure 401) SUBTASK 420-002-A (1) Put the ram-air check valve (2) in the installation position. NOTE: Make sure of the correct position of the flow indication arrow. (2) Install the clamps (1). J. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Install the access panel (AMM MPP 06-41-01/100), as applicable: – 191EL (LH ram-air check valve). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 21-25-02 Page 4 of 7 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL – 191FR (RH ram-air check valve). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 21-25-02 Page 5 of 7 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 21-25-02-040-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 4. RAM-AIR CHECK VALVE - DEACTIVATION PROCEDURES A. General (1) It it permitted to dispatch the airplane with one or both ram air check valves inoperative open provided flight is conducted in an unpressurized configuration. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION ELECTROPNEUMATIC OUTFLOW VALVE - DEACTI- AMM TASK 21-31-03-040-801-A/400 VATION PROCEDURE PNEUMATIC OUTFLOW VALVE - DEACTIVATION AMM TASK 21-31-04-040-801-A/400 PROCEDURE C. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended Not Applicable I. Deactivation Procedures SUBTASK 040-002-A (1) Refer to Electropneumatic and Pneumatic Outflow Valves Deactivation Procedures (AMM TASK 21-31-03-040-801-A/400 and AMM TASK 21-31-04-040-801-A/400 ) for outflow valves secured open. (2) Write in the aircraft technical logbook that you did the deactivation procedure for the Ram-Air Check Valve. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 040-801-A/400 21-25-02 Page 6 of 7 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 21-25-02-440-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 5. RAM-AIR CHECK VALVE - REACTIVATION PROCEDURES A. General (1) This task gives the procedures to reactivate the Ram-Air Check Valve. (2) This task refers to item 21-25-02 - Ram-Air Check Valves - of DDPM. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION ELECTROPNEUMATIC OUTFLOW VALVE - REACTI- AMM TASK 21-31-03-440-801-A/400 VATION PROCEDURE PNEUMATIC OUTFLOW VALVE - REACTIVATION AMM TASK 21-31-04-440-801-A/400 PROCEDURE C. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended Not Applicable I. Reactivation Procedures SUBTASK 440-002-A (1) Do the troubleshooting and the applicable corrective maintenance procedure for the Ram-Air Check Valve. (2) Refer to Electropneumatic and Pneumatic Outflow Valves Reactivation Procedures (AMM TASK 21-31-03-440-801-A/400 and AMM TASK 21-31-04-440-801-A/400 ), if required.
